fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guess if another player is (5144) The Angel On Your Shoulder (Angel for short). If you are correct, you are notified and you deal an Overkill Attack to them.
- Learn the subalignment that another player appears to be. If they appear to be part of your faction, you will also be notified.

fields.name: Guess Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect Immune
- Roleblock Immune
- Astral
- Bypasses Disguises
- You only have one and cannot be granted more.

fields.name: General Attributes:
fields.value:
- Conversion Immune
- You passively appear to be the Angel to investigators. Your role remains disguised even if it is revealed as a result of your death.
- You have an anonymous private chat with the Power/Head/Leader of your faction. They will be told your (disguised) role, but not your name.
- If the Angel would spawn with a faction that has no Power/Head/Leader, reroll this.
- Force-spawn the Angel if it doesn't already exist.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate the Angel and ensure the victory of your faction.
